 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַט‎</span>] **verb** ==slip away== (not in **Qal**) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִילּוּט‎</span> ***rescue***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלַט‎</span> (rare) = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***have scanty hair***; IV. ***cast the foetus without hair***; [***slip away, escape*** from hand is <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">]); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְלַט‎</span> [[Judg.3.26|Judg 3:26]] + 6 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְלְטָה‎</span> [[Ps.124.7|Ps 124:7]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְ‎</span> consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִמְלָ֑טָה‎</span> [[Jer.48.19|Jer 48:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְלָ֑טוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.4.6|2Sam 4:6]] + 8 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּלֵט‎</span> [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] + 13 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמּ‎</span> [[Judg.3.26|Judg 3:26]] + 7 t.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמָּֽלְטָה‎</span> [[Gen.19.20|Gen 19:20]] +; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמָּלֵ֑טוּ‎</span> [[Mal.3.15|Mal 3:15]] + 1 2 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמָּלֵט‎</span> [[Gen.19.17|Gen 19:17]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.19.22|Gen 19:22]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמָּֽלְטִי‎</span> [[Zech.2.11|Zech 2:11]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמָּלֵט‎</span> [[1Sam.27.1|1Sam 27:1]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִם אִמָּלֵט‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] Löhr [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]; &gt; [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִם‎</span> before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמּ‎</span>); construct ***id.***, [[Gen.19.19|Gen 19:19]]; [[Esth.4.3|Esth 4:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְלָט‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.17|1Kgs 19:17]] (twice in verse); — 

**1.** ***slip away*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמָּֽלְטָה נָּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶרְאֶה אֶתאֶֿחָ֑י‎</span> [[1Sam.20.29|1Sam 20:29]] ***let me slip away to see my brethren; slip through***, or ***past*** (into the house) [[2Sam.4.6|2Sam 4:6]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] and **Pi\`el 1, Hiph\`il 2**; &gt; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְאָ֑טוּ‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאט‎</span>, after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἔλαθον</span>). 

**2.** ***escape***, [[Judg.3.29|Judg 3:29]]; [[1Sam.19.10|1Sam 19:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּס‎</span>) v[[1Sam.19.12|1Sam 19:12]] v[[1Sam.19.18|1Sam 19:18]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרַח‎</span>), v[[1Sam.19.17|1Sam 19:17]]; [[1Sam.22.20|1Sam 22:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרַח‎</span>), [[1Sam.30.17|1Sam 30:17]]; [[1Kgs.18.40|1Kgs 18:40]]; [[1Kgs.20.20|1Kgs 20:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּס‎</span>) [[2Kgs.10.24|2Kgs 10:24]]; [[Isa.20.6|Isa 20:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצַּל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּס‎</span>), [[Isa.49.24|Isa 49:24]]; [[Isa.49.25|Isa 49:25]]; [[Jer.46.6|Jer 46:6]]; [[Jer.48.8|Jer 48:8]]; [[Jer.48.19|Jer 48:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּס‎</span>), [[Ezek.17.15|Ezek 17:15]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.17.18|Ezek 17:18]]; [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]]; [[Joel.3.5|Joel 3:5]]; [[Zech.2.11|Zech 2:11]]; [[Mal.3.15|Mal 3:15]]; [[Ps.124.7|Ps 124:7]]; [[Prov.19.6|Prov 19:6]]; [[Job.1.15|Job 1:15]]; [[Job.1.16|Job 1:16]]; [[Job.1.17|Job 1:17]]; [[Job.1.19|Job 1:19]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of place whence [[1Sam.23.13|1Sam 23:13]]; [[2Sam.1.3|2Sam 1:3]]; [[Ps.124.7|Ps 124:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> = whither [[1Sam.22.1|1Sam 22:1]]; [[1Sam.27.1|1Sam 27:1]] (twice in verse); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> [[Judg.3.26|Judg 3:26]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ָ  ה‎</span> locative, [[Gen.19.17|Gen 19:17]]; [[Gen.19.19|Gen 19:19]]; [[Gen.19.20|Gen 19:20]]; [[Gen.19.22|Gen 19:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.3.26|Judg 3:26]] with accusative [[2Kgs.19.37|2Kgs 19:37]] = [[Isa.37.38|Isa 37:38]]; [[Esth.4.13|Esth 4:13]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of person from whom [[Eccl.7.26|Eccl 7:26]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד‎</span> [[1Sam.27.1|1Sam 27:1]]; [[2Chr.16.7|2Chr 16:7]]; [[Jer.32.4|Jer 32:4]]; [[Jer.34.3|Jer 34:3]]; [[Jer.38.18|Jer 38:18]]; [[Jer.38.23|Jer 38:23]]; [[Dan.11.41|Dan 11:41]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> [[Jer.41.15|Jer 41:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵחֶרֶב‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.17|1Kgs 19:17]] (twice in verse); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלנֶֿפֶשׁ‎</span> ***for one's life*** [[Gen.19.17|Gen 19:17]]. 

**3.** passive ***be delivered*** [[Ps.22.6|Ps 22:6]]; [[Prov.11.21|Prov 11:21]]; [[Prov.28.26|Prov 28:26]]; [[Job.22.30|Job 22:30]]; [[Dan.12.1|Dan 12:1]] (later usage). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּט‎</span> [[Ezek.33.5|Ezek 33:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִלַּטֿ‎</span> [[Eccl.9.15|Eccl 9:15]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְּטֵ֫נוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.10|2Sam 19:10]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלֵּט‎</span> [[Amos.2.14|Amos 2:14]] + 8 t., suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלְּטֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Ps.41.2|Ps 41:2]] + 5 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְּטָה‎</span> [[Ps.116.4|Ps 116:4]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְּטִי‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.12|1Kgs 1:12]] + 4 t. Imperative; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלֵּט‎</span> [[Isa.46.2|Isa 46:2]]; [[Jer.39.18|Jer 39:18]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַלֵּט‎</span> [[1Sam.19.11|1Sam 19:11]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַלְּטִים‎</span> [[2Sam.19.6|2Sam 19:6]] — 

**1.** ***lay*** (eggs; i.e. let them slip out; of arrow-snake) [[Isa.34.15|Isa 34:15]]. 

**2.** ***let escape:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וימלטו עצמתיו‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.18|2Kgs 23:18]] ***and so they let his bones*** (the prophet's) ***escape*** (from the burning). 

**3.** ***deliver***, absolute [[Isa.46.4|Isa 46:4]] with accusative [[Isa.46.2|Isa 46:2]]; [[Jer.39.18|Jer 39:18]] (twice in verse); [[Ps.41.2|Ps 41:2]]; [[Job.22.30|Job 22:30]]; [[Job.29.12|Job 29:12]]; [[Eccl.8.8|Eccl 8:8]]; [[Eccl.9.15|Eccl 9:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד‎</span> [[Job.6.23|Job 6:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכַּף‎</span> [[2Sam.19.10|2Sam 19:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְּׁחִיתוֺתָם‎</span> [[Ps.107.20|Ps 107:20]] elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּט נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> ***deliver, save, life*** [[1Sam.19.11|1Sam 19:11]]; [[2Sam.19.6|2Sam 19:6]]; [[1Kgs.1.12|1Kgs 1:12]]; [[Jer.48.6|Jer 48:6]]; [[Jer.51.6|Jer 51:6]]; [[Jer.51.45|Jer 51:45]]; [[Ezek.33.5|Ezek 33:5]]; [[Amos.2.14|Amos 2:14]]; [[Amos.2.15|Amos 2:15]]; [[Ps.89.49|Ps 89:49]]; [[Ps.116.4|Ps 116:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפשׁ‎</span>. omitted [[Amos.2.15|Amos 2:15]]; [[Ps.33.17|Ps 33:17]]; [[Job.20.20|Job 20:20]]. — (This form not in Hexateuch, Judges, Chronicles, [[BDB#Isa|Isa]]<sup>1</sup>) **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמְלִיט‎</span> [[Isa.31.5|Isa 31:5]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמְ֫לִיטָה‎</span> [[Isa.66.7|Isa 66:7]]. 

**1.** ***give birth to*** a male child [[Isa.66.7|Isa 66:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָָֽלְדָה‎</span>, compare **Pi\`el 1**). 

**2.** ***deliver:*** absolute [[Isa.31.5|Isa 31:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּנַן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַח‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶתְמַלְּטָה‎</span> [[Job.19.20|Job 19:20]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְמַלְּטוּ‎</span> [[Job.41.11|Job 41:11]]. 

**1.** ***slip forth, escape*** (sparks of fire from jaws of crocodile; [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***leap forth***) [[Job.41.11|Job 41:11]]. 

**2.** ***escape*** (with the skin of the teeth, the gums; only these left unattacked by leprosy) [[Job.19.20|Job 19:20]].
